hivis.data.reader

Class SpreadSheetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • hivis.data.reader.SpreadSheetReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetSource<DataTable>

    public class SpreadSheetReader
extends Object
implements DataSetSource<DataTable>
    Class to read data from a spreadsheet file. The data is presented as a DataTable. The DataTable is automatically updated when the file changes. Currently only Excel files are supported (xlsx format). TODO Support other file formats. TODO Currently columns in the sheet are read as DataSeries. Add support for row-based format. TODO Support specifying a range of cells to read from (rather than to the end of the sheet).
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpreadSheetReader(File file)
      Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file.
      SpreadSheetReader(File file, int sheet, int headerRow, int firstDataRow, int firstDataColumn)
      Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file and sheet, with data beginning at the specified row and column.
      SpreadSheetReader(File file, int sheet, int headerRow, int firstDataRow, int firstDataColumn, boolean doublePrecision)
      Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file and sheet, with data beginning at the specified row and column.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpreadSheetReader

        public SpreadSheetReader(File file)
        Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file. Data is read from sheet 0. If the first row contains all strings, except one column at most, then it is used as the header row. Numeric series will be created as DataSeries<Double>.
        Parameters:
        file - The spreadsheet file.

      • SpreadSheetReader

        public SpreadSheetReader(File file,
                         int sheet,
                         int headerRow,
                         int firstDataRow,
                         int firstDataColumn)
        Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file and sheet, with data beginning at the specified row and column. Numeric series will be created as DataSeries<Double>.
        Parameters:
        file - The spreadsheet file.
        sheet - The index of the sheet in the spreadsheet to read from.
        headerRow - The index of the row to use as column headers.
        firstDataRow - The row to start reading data from (to the end of the sheet).
        firstDataColumn - The column to start creating series from (up to the right-most column).

      • SpreadSheetReader

        public SpreadSheetReader(File file,
                         int sheet,
                         int headerRow,
                         int firstDataRow,
                         int firstDataColumn,
                         boolean doublePrecision)
        Create a new SpreadSheetReader that reads data from the specified file and sheet, with data beginning at the specified row and column.
        Parameters:
        file - The spreadsheet file.
        sheet - The index of the sheet in the spreadsheet to read from.
        headerRow - The index of the row to use as column headers.
        firstDataRow - The row to start reading data from (to the end of the sheet).
        firstDataColumn - The column to start creating series from (up to the right-most column).
        doublePrecision - If true then numeric series will be created as DataSeries<Double>, otherwise they will be created as DataSeries<Float>.
